task-panel.config.treeCollapsibleState: Set initial tree collapsible state after panel show tasks.
task-panel.config.treeCollapsibleState.e: The Tasks tree is shown expanded.
task-panel.config.treeCollapsibleState.c: The Tasks tree is shown collapsed.
task-panel.config.search.gulpTasks: Enable the searching for Gulp tasks.
task-panel.config.search.gruntTasks: Enable the searching for Grunt tasks.
task-panel.config.search.npmTasks: Enable the searching for NPM tasks.
task-panel.config.search.searchCondition: A value specifying where extension search for task files.
Searching for task file only in project root folder.
Searching for task file only in project sub folder defined in configuration section 'In Sub Folders'.
Searching for task file in project root folder and defined sub folders.
task-panel.config.search.inSubFolders: A value specifying sub folders where extension search for task files.
task-panel.taskloader.rootPathIsNotSet: The Root path is not set.
task-panel.taskloader.taskFileIsNotFound: The {0} task definition file is not found.
task-panel.taskruner.executeProcessError: Task or Task execution is not defined!
task-panel.taskruner.taskExistsInRunning: Task '{0}' is already in execution queue.
task-panel.taskruner.cannotTerminateTask: Cannot terminate task. Task PID is undefined!
